main event: A witness observed a very bright silvery object that stopped and hovered at about 1,000 feet in Crete, Illinois on August 29, 1960.
interesting points: The object traveled slowly on an erratic course, moving up and down,The object seemed to disappear after about 12-15 seconds,The witness described the object as having unusual movement patterns resembling zigzag motions,The object appeared silver in color, metallic, and reflective,The witness's belief was that the object exhibited properties not typical of conventional aircraft.
witness description: an individual who reported the sighting
